verses.name: Genesis 17:21
verses.text: But my covenant will I establish with Isaac, which Sarah shall bear unto thee at this set time in the next year.

verses.name: Genesis 17:22
verses.text: And he left off talking with him, and God went up from Abraham.

verses.name: Genesis 17:23
verses.text: And Abraham took Ishmael his son, and all that were born in his house, and all that were bought with his money, every male among the men of Abraham’s house; and circumcised the flesh of their foreskin in the selfsame day, as God had said unto him.

verses.name: Genesis 17:24
verses.text: And Abraham was ninety years old and nine, when he was circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin.
